author: babaelliot
title: PLUTUS/CATALYST RESOURCE IN SWAHILI
description: 150 million Swahili speakers in the East Africa region don't have access to education and resources which will lift them out of poverty
solution: Collaborating with EBU and Eastern Town Hall to translate and provide education on Plutus  and catalyst resources  in Swahili language.
experience:
- Trainer on Financial Market and Blockchain Technology at RFFXTZ Company Limited
- Speaker 
- Content Creator and Marketing Expert
